creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: silhouette of a woman sweeping, wearing a white bonnet (not in black silhouette); blue ground; "The Marchioness / Old Curiosity Shop" in pencil under image
medium: Pen and ink, graphite and watercolor (?) on card
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: The Marchioness Old Curiosity Shop [silhouette of woman sweeping]
